preferences.name: alwaysPrivate
preferences.title: Always default to private ticket posts

preferences.name: prepNOC
preferences.title: Makes sure ticket is properly tagged when escalating to NOC

preferences.name: companyName
preferences.title: Default to "Company Name" rather than "Customer ID" when creating a new ticket

preferences.name: acdKicker
preferences.title: Automatically requeue when released from ACD
